00028 namespace {
00029 void sub_add(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00030     n2)
00031 {
00032     bool swap(n1._get_length() < n2._get_length());
00033     const base_integer &larger(swap ? n2 : n1), &smaller(swap ? n1 : n2);
00034 
00035     // The answer to any addition problem contains, at most, one digit more
00036     // than the largest addend.
00037     integer a;
00038     a._realloc(larger._get_length() + 1);
00039 
00040     // Add the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00041     const digit_t *lp = larger._get_digits(), *l_end = lp + larger._get_length(),
00042         *sp = smaller._get_digits(), *s_end = sp + smaller._get_length();
00043     digit_t *ap = a._get_writable_digits(), *a_end = ap + a._get_length();
00044 
00045     digit_t carry = 0;
00046     while (sp != s_end) {
00047         doubledigit_t t = doubledigit_t(*lp++) + *sp++ + carry;
00048         if (t >= digit_overflowbit) {
00049             carry = 1;
00050             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t - digit_overflowbit);
00051         } else {
00052             carry = 0;
00053             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00057     if (carry) {
00058         while (lp != l_end) {
00059             if (*lp == digit_mask) { *ap++ = 0; ++lp; }
00060             else { *ap++ = *lp++ + 1; carry = 0; break; }
00061         }
00062     }
00063     if (carry && ap != a_end) *ap++ = 1;
00064 
00065     while (lp != l_end) *ap++ = *lp++;
00066     while (ap != a_end) *ap++ = 0;
00067 
00068     if (n1._get_negative()) a._set_negative(true);
00069     a._cleanup();
00070     target._attach(a);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void sub_subtract(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00074     base_integer& n2)
00075 {
00076     bool neg1=n1._get_negative();
00077     bool swap=((neg1 ? 1 : -1) == compare(n1, n2));
00078     const base_integer &larger(swap ? n2 : n1), &smaller(swap ? n1 : n2);
00079 
00080     // For subtraction, the answer will always be less than or equal to the
00081     // size of the longest operand.
00082     integer a;
00083     a._realloc(larger._get_length());
00084 
00085     // Now subtract the digits, starting at the least-significant one.
00086     const digit_t *lp = larger._get_digits(), *l_end = lp + larger._get_length(),
00087         *sp = smaller._get_digits(), *s_end = sp + smaller._get_length();
00088     digit_t *ap = a._get_writable_digits();
00089 
00090     digit_t borrow = 0;
00091     while (sp != s_end) {
00092         doubledigit_t t = digit_overflowbit + *lp++ - *sp++ - borrow;
00093         if (t < digit_overflowbit) {
00094             borrow = 1;
00095             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00096         } else {
00097             borrow = 0;
00098             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t - digit_overflowbit);
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (borrow) {
00103         while (lp != l_end) {
00104             if (*lp == 0) { *ap++ = digit_mask; ++lp; }
00105             else { *ap++ = *lp++ - 1; borrow = 0; break; }
00106         }
00107     }
00108     while (lp != l_end) *ap++ = *lp++;
00109     if (borrow != 0) swap = !swap;
00110 
00111     if (neg1) a._set_negative(true);
00112     a._cleanup();
00113 
00114     if (swap) {
00115         target._attach(neg_t(a));
00116     } else {
00117         target._attach(a);
00118     }
00119 }

00121 void divide_by_single_digit(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00122     base_integer& d1, digit_t d2)
00123 {
00124     size_t d1len=d1._get_length();
00125     const digit_t *d1digits=d1._get_digits();
00126 
00127     integer quotient, remainder;
00128     quotient._realloc(d1len);
00129     remainder._realloc(1);
00130 
00131     doubledigit_t a=0;
00132     const doubledigit_t lomask(digit_mask);
00133     const doubledigit_t himask(doubledigit_t(digit_mask) << bits_per_digit);
00134 
00135     int m = int(d1len) - 1;
00136     const digit_t *d1p=d1digits+m;
00137     digit_t *qp=quotient._get_writable_digits()+m;
00138     for (int i = m; i >= 0; --i, --d1p, --qp) {
00139         a = (a & ~lomask) | *d1p;
00140         *qp = static_cast<digit_t>(a / d2);
00141         a = (a & ~himask) | ((a % d2) << bits_per_digit);
00142     }
00143     remainder._get_writable_digits()[0] = static_cast<digit_t>((a & himask) >>
00144         bits_per_digit);
00145 
00146     quotient._cleanup();
00147     remainder._cleanup();
00148     qtarget._attach(quotient);
00149     rtarget._attach(remainder);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void sub_divide2(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00153     base_integer& d1, const base_integer& d2)
00154 {
00155     assert(d2._get_digit(d2._get_length()-1) >= digit_overflowbit / 2);
00156 
00157     const digit_t *byDigits = d2._get_digits();
00158 
00159     integer quotient, r(d1._to_integer());
00160 
00161     size_t n=d2._get_length(), m=d1._get_length() - n;
00162     size_t i=m+n, j=m;
00163     quotient._realloc(j+1);
00164     digit_t *qdigits=quotient._get_writable_digits();
00165 
00166     r._make_unique();
00167     do {
00168         doubledigit_t ri=(doubledigit_t(r._get_digit(i, true))
00169             << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-1, true);
00170         doubledigit_t q=(std::min<doubledigit_t>)(ri / byDigits[n-1],
00171             digit_mask);
00172 
00173         while (1) {
00174             // We need three digits here, a doubledigit_t won't suffice.
00175             doubledigit_t r2a=ri - (q * byDigits[n-1]);
00176             integer r2=(integer(r2a) << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-2);
00177             if (byDigits[n-2] * q <= r2) break;
00178             --q;
00179         }
00180 
00181         integer bq;
00182         multiply(bq, d2, fixed_integer_any(q));
00183         if (r < bq) {
00184             --q;
00185             subtract(bq, temp_t(bq), d2);
00186         }
00187 
00188         integer rtemp((r >> (bits_per_digit * (i-n))) - bq);
00189 
00190         digit_t *rdigits=r._get_writable_digits();
00191 
00192         size_t rlen=r._get_length();
00193         for (size_t x=0; x<=n && i-n+x < rlen; ++x)
00194             rdigits[i-n+x]=rtemp._get_digit(x, true);
00195         r._cleanup();
00196 
00197         qdigits[j--]=digit_t(q);
00198     } while (--i >= n);
00199 
00200     quotient._cleanup();
00201 
00202     qtarget._attach(quotient);
00203     rtarget._attach(r);
00204 }
00205 
00206 void sub_divide(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00207     base_integer& d1, const base_integer& d2)
00208 {
00209     if (d2._get_length()==1) {
00210         divide_by_single_digit(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2._get_digit(0));
00211         return;
00212     }
00213 
00214     // The normalization step
00215     digit_t _d = static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit /
00216         (doubledigit_t(d2._get_digit(d2._get_length()-1))+1));
00217     if (_d > 1) {
00218         fixed_integer_any d(_d);
00219 
00220         integer dd1, dd2;
00221         multiply(dd1, d1, d);
00222         multiply(dd2, d2, d);
00223 
00224         integer q, r;
00225         sub_divide2(q, r, dd1, dd2);
00226 
00227         // Denormalization step. This requires a division by a single digit_t.
00228         integer qq, rr;
00229         divide_by_single_digit(qq, rr, r, _d);
00230         qtarget._attach(q);
00231         rtarget._attach(qq);
00232     } else {
00233         sub_divide2(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2);
00234     }
00235 }

00239 void add(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer& n2) {
00240     if (n1._is_zero()) {
00241         target._attach(n2);
00242         return;
00243     } else if (n2._is_zero()) {
00244         target._attach(n1);
00245         return;
00246     } else if (n1._get_negative() != n2._get_negative()) {
00247         sub_subtract(target, n1, neg_t(n2));
00248     } else {
00249         sub_add(target, n1, n2);
00250     }
00251 }
00252 
00253 void subtract(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00254     n2)
00255 {
00256     if (n1._is_zero()) {
00257         target._attach(neg_t(n2));
00258     } else if (n2._is_zero()) {
00259         target._attach(n1);
00260     } else if (n1._get_negative() != n2._get_negative()) {
00261         sub_add(target, n1, neg_t(n2));
00262     } else {
00263         sub_subtract(target, n1, n2);
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void multiply(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, const base_integer&
00268     by)
00269 {
00270     if (n._is_zero() || by._is_zero()) {
00271         target._set_unsigned(0);
00272         return;
00273     }
00274 
00275     const digit_t *ndigits=n._get_digits(), *bydigits=by._get_digits();
00276     if (ndigits==bydigits) {
00277         sqr(target, n);
00278         if (n._get_negative() != by._get_negative()) target._set_negative(true);
00279         return;
00280     }
00281 
00282     size_t maxdigit = target._is_fixed()
00283         ? target._fixed_digits()
00284         : (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)();
00285     size_t nlen=n._get_length(), bylen=by._get_length();
00286 
00287     // In multiplication, we know that the answer will be less than or equal to
00288     // the sum of the lengths of the operands.
00289     integer answer;
00290     answer._realloc(nlen + bylen);
00291     digit_t *adigits=answer._get_writable_digits(), *ae = adigits +
00292         (std::min)(nlen + bylen, maxdigit);
00293 
00294     // Now multiply the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00295     const digit_t *d1 = ndigits, *d1e = d1 + (std::min)(nlen, maxdigit);
00296     for (int digit1 = 0; d1 < d1e; ++digit1, ++d1) {
00297         const digit_t *d2 = bydigits;
00298         const digit_t *d2e = d2 + (std::min)(bylen, maxdigit - digit1);
00299         for (int digit2 = 0; d2 < d2e; ++digit2, ++d2) {
00300             // First multiply the two digits
00301             doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(*d1) * *d2;
00302 
00303             // Now add the result to the answer.
00304             int carry=0;
00305             digit_t *a = adigits + digit1 + digit2;
00306             doubledigit_t addt=doubledigit_t(*a) + (t & digit_mask);
00307             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1;
00308             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00309 
00310             addt=*a + ((t >> bits_per_digit) & digit_mask) + carry;
00311             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1; else carry=0;
00312             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00313 
00314             while (carry && a < ae) {
00315                 addt=*a+1;
00316                 *a++ = static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00317                 if (addt < digit_overflowbit) break;
00318             }
00319         }
00320     }
00321 
00322     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative() != by._get_negative());
00323     answer._cleanup();
00324     target._attach(answer);
00325 }
00326 
00327 void divide(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const base_integer&
00328     d1, const base_integer& d2)
00329 {
00330     int sign1 = (d1._is_zero() ? 0 : d1._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00331     int sign2 = (d2._is_zero() ? 0 : d2._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00332     if (sign2 == 0) throw exceptions::divide_by_zero();
00333 
00334     int comp=compare(d1, d2, true);
00335     if (comp < 0) {
00336         qtarget._attach(integer::zero());
00337         rtarget._attach(d1);
00338     } else if (comp == 0) {
00339         qtarget._attach(fixed_integer_any(sign1 != sign2 ? 1 : -1));
00340         rtarget._attach(integer::zero());
00341     } else if (sign1 < 0 && sign2 < 0) {
00342         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, neg_t(d1), neg_t(d2));
00343         rtarget._set_negative(true);
00344     } else if (sign1 < 0) {
00345         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, neg_t(d1), d2);
00346         qtarget._set_negative(true);
00347         rtarget._set_negative(true);
00348     } else if (sign2 < 0) {
00349         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, d1, neg_t(d2));
00350         qtarget._set_negative(true);
00351     } else if (d2._get_length() == 1) {
00352         divide_by_single_digit(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2._get_digit(0));
00353     } else {
00354         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2);
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 void divide(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00359     n2)
00360 {
00361     integer remainder;
00362     divide(target, remainder, n1, n2);
00363 }

00375 integer abs(const integer& n) {
00376     if (n._get_negative()) {
00377         return -n;
00378     } else {
00379         return n;
00380     }
00381 }

00391 integer negate(const integer& n) {
00392     integer nn(n);
00393     nn._toggle_negative();
00394     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(nn);
00395 }

00405 integer add(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00406     integer r;
00407     detail::add(r, n1, n2);
00408     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00453 integer divide(const integer& dividend, const integer& divisor) {
00454     integer q, r;
00455     detail::divide(q, r, dividend, divisor);
00456     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q);

00472 integer::divide_t divide_r(const integer& d1, const integer& d2) {
00473     integer q, r;
00474     detail::divide(q, r, d1, d2);
00475     return BOOST_XINT_FORWARD(integer::divide_t, integer::divide_t(
00476         BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q), BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r)));
00477 }
